## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No unnecessary console logs or debug code
- [ ] No hardcoded values (use environment variables/config)

### Documentation

- [ ] Documentation updated (README, inline comments, etc.)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Examples updated or added (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] No sensitive information committed (passwords, API keys, etc.)
- [ ] Security implications considered
- [ ] Input validation added where necessary
- [ ] No known vulnerabilities introduced

### Compatibility

- [ ] Changes are backward compatible
- [ ] Breaking changes documented
- [ ] Migration guide provided (if breaking changes)
- [ ] Tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)
